com.rti.dds.example.file
Class ReaderTrackingWriterListener

java.lang.Object
  com.rti.dds.example.util.DebugDataWriterListener
      com.rti.dds.example.file.ReaderTrackingWriterListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.rti.dds.publication.DataWriterListener, java.util.EventListener, com.rti.dds.infrastructure.Listener
public class ReaderTrackingWriterListener
extends DebugDataWriterListener

ReaderTrackingWriterListener handles on_publication_matched callbacks and takes appropriate measures when readers leave or join.

Field Summary
private  FileSegmenter fileSegmenter
          Handle to Segmenter, so we can notify it to start or stop processing files

          Handle to WriteThread, so we can notify it to start or stop sending FileSegments

          Standard java.util logger

          Queue containing FileSegments waiting to be written to DDS.
protected  int readerCurrentCount
          Number of readers as of the last on_publication_matched()
